ValidationRule.description: PSC callouts cannot be requested for internal Paychex partners.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")) && RecordTypeId = "012700000001U2z" && ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c, "PSC") && OR(ISPICKVAL( Disposition_2__c,"Branch"), ISPICKVAL( Disposition_2__c,"Client Retention"), ISPICKVAL( Disposition_2__c,"CSS"), ISPICKVAL( Disposition_2__c,"DSM - Post"), ISPICKVAL( Disposition_2__c,"DSM - Pre"), ISPICKVAL( Disposition_2__c,"ERR"), ISPICKVAL( Disposition_2__c,"HRG"), ISPICKVAL( Disposition_2__c,"HRS Internal Partner"), ISPICKVAL( Disposition_2__c,"HRS Manager"), ISPICKVAL( Disposition_2__c,"IT Rep"), ISPICKVAL( Disposition_2__c,"Non-HRIS Internal Partner"), ISPICKVAL( Disposition_2__c,"Paychex Sales - Post"), ISPICKVAL( Disposition_2__c,"Paychex Sales - Pre"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PSC call outs cannot be requested for internal Paychex partners. Please remove the Reassign-Categories to save the case, as these discussions cannot be made with unlicensed Paychex employees.
